Package com.example.scribbleshare.network

Class EndpointCaller<T>

java.lang.Object
com.example.scribbleshare.network.EndpointCaller<T>
Type Parameters:
T - The type of the request
public class EndpointCaller<T> extends Object
A model type object which communicates with the server. It is assumed that the specified parameter is the return type of the requests

      public static final String baseURL
      The URL of the endpoint. (The local one is also present below for easier testing

  • Constructor Details

    • EndpointCaller

      public EndpointCaller(Context context, IVolleyListener<T> listener)
      Create an endpoint caller with given context and listener objects
      Parameters:
      context - the context which the caller resides
      listener - the listener with which the requests will be sent to one received

  • Method Details

    • createAccountRequest

      public void createAccountRequest(String username, String password)
      Create a new account
      Parameters:
      username - Account username
      password - Account password (plaintext)

    • signInRequest

      public void signInRequest(String username, String password)
      Attempt a sign in
      Parameters:
      username - attempted username sign in
      password - attempted password sign in

    • createPostRequest

      public void createPostRequest(String username, Bitmap scribble)
      Create a new post and save the specified bitmap
      Parameters:
      username - Username of the account to create the post
      scribble - Bitmap of the post's image to be saved on the database

    • getHomeScreenPostsRequest

      public void getHomeScreenPostsRequest(String username)
      Get the home screen posts for a specified user
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the user to get the recommended home screen posts

    • getPostFrames

      public void getPostFrames(String postId)
      Get the frames of a specified post
      Parameters:
      postId - the id of the post

    • createCommentRequest

      public void createCommentRequest(String username, int frameId, Bitmap scribble)
      Create a new comment
      Parameters:
      username - Username of the user who made the comment
      frameId - Frame id with which the comment was made
      scribble - Bitmap of the image the comment was made under

    • createFrameRequest

      public void createFrameRequest(String username, String postId, int index)
      Create a new frame for the specified post
      Parameters:
      username - Username of the user creating the frame
      postId - Id of the post to create the new frame
      index - Index of the new frame for the post (for concurrency)
